title: Apply a smart blue background theme across the site

requirements.text: Update the site’s visual theme to a “smart blue” color direction by adjusting the Tailwind theme tokens (CSS variables) so that global backgrounds and section backgrounds (e.g., muted/accent sections) read as modern corporate blue rather than the current warm-neutral palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Light mode background, muted, and accent surfaces use a cohesive smart-blue tint (not warm beige/neutral).
Primary interactive elements (e.g., primary buttons, focus rings, primary icons) reflect the updated smart-blue palette and remain readable with sufficient contrast.
Pages Home, Services, About, and Contact consistently reflect the updated background theme without breaking layout or readability.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep routing unchanged; do not add new pages or routes.
nonGoals: Creating a new 'Team' page/section or adding new content blocks (only adjust background/theme colors).
